name: AshevilleBuses
0:
”Alexa, ask Bus Buddy to tell me about stop 999.”
”Alexa, open Bus Buddy and tell me the next bus arriving at 666.”
”Alexa, ask Bus Buddy about stop 200.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bus buddy
des:
Asheville Redefines Transit (ART) is the municipally-owned operator of public transportation in Asheville, North Carolina. 
Each Bust Stop has a three digit number which allows Asheville Buses to find the next arriving buses.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
